name: Doppel (Urgloshkin)
description:
Navigate your way through various obstacles and puzzles using two characters - your main character and your doppelganger. Be careful, though: both characters react to inputs simultaneously, so be sure to check both characters' locations before making your moves!

Controls:

Requires mouse and keyboard.

[AD] to move

[SPACE] to jump

[E] to activate jump pads

[Q] to invert movement

[K] to force respawn

[LMB] for handling UI
